TopicTitle: Replacing default audio files using a mod.

Articles.Content: I'm new to making mods for ksp, i have made some parts but haven't really attempted anything to do with programming (mostly because i can't code). I can however make music and i am interested in a way i can replace some of the default music with my own, is there a way i can put some audio files in the gamedata folder and use some sort of config or plugin to replace the default ones. Sorry if this is a super newbie question, i just couldn't find much online about this - and of course any help would be much appreciated!

A mod for customizing the background music (when what plays) exists already. I don't use it and don't know if it works in 1.6 (surely it works in 1.5) so I can't say anything further. But it's awesome that you can make music. Have fun.
